beans.description:
This adaptor does the following...
* exposes an rmi service that clients can send data to * writes data to stdout
It is designed to illustrate the basic structure of exposing an adaptor as a an rmi service.
Run it like this...
java org.openadaptor.spring.SpringAdaptor -config server.xml -bean Adaptor
You need the following in your classpath
lib lib/openadaptor.jar lib/openadaptor-spring.jar lib/openadaptor-depends.jar
To test it fully you can run the other example which processes data by invoking the service.
